definition: to kill/to murder/to attack/to weaken or reduce/to smart (dialect)/(used after a verb) extremely

sentences.english: Plus, although she's a vampire, she doesn't go around killing innocent humans.
sentences.chinese: 最后，尽管她是一名吸血鬼，她并没有滥杀无辜人类。

sentences.english: The Tang Dynasty the monk misunderstands Sun Wu empty excessive to kill however innocent, chase its a division door.
sentences.chinese: 唐僧却误会孙悟空滥杀无辜，将其逐出师门。

sentences.english: Ming Kenso years, eunuch excesses, killing Xian Chen.
sentences.chinese: 明宪宗年间，宦官弄权，滥杀贤臣。

sentences.english: I became famous for my unfair slaughtering of the innocent.
sentences.chinese: 因为我滥杀无辜，我变得很有名气。

sentences.english: Whooping cranes have been all but wiped out in North America through hunting and disease.
sentences.chinese: 由于滥捕滥杀和疾病，美洲鹤在南美洲几近灭绝。

definition: to hunt and kill (an animal or fish)
to break the law and commit crimes (idiom); malefactor/evildoer/to perpetrate outrages
death cannot wipe out the crimes (idiom); dreadful crimes that rankled even after the perpetrator is dead
to kill to the last one (idiom)/to exterminate/to eradicate/ruthless
to go against the tide (idiom); to do things all wrong/to try to turn back history/a perverse way of doing things
an execution/to put sb to death
